Package index

Core Power Analysis Functions

Main functions for conducting Bayesian power analysis

power_analysis()
Flexible Bayesian Power Analysis for RCTs
power_analysis_ancova()
Power Analysis for ANCOVA Model (Multiple Outcome Types)
power_grid_analysis()
Power Grid Analysis for Bayesian RCTs

Visualization Functions

Functions for plotting and visualizing power analysis results

plot(<rctbayespower>)
Plot Power Analysis Results
plot(<rctbayespower_grid>)
Plot Power Grid Analysis Results

Validation and Utilities

Helper functions for validating designs and settings

validate_power_design()
Validate Power Analysis Design
validate_weighting_function()
Validate Weighting Function Implementation

Output Methods

Methods for printing and summarizing results

print(<rctbayespower>)
Print method for rctbayespower objects
print(<rctbayespower_grid>)
Print method for power grid analysis objects
summary(<rctbayespower>)
Summary Method for Power Analysis Results
summary(<rctbayespower_grid>)
Summary method for power grid analysis objects

Package Documentation

General package information

rctbayespower-package rctbayespower
The 'rctbayespower' package.
